name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James Harris CURRY, Jr., Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
440 A.2d 1190
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. James Harris CURRY, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 21, 1982.
Decided Feb. 19, 1982.
William T. Cannon, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Garold Tennis, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
